name: Squeezy Car
description:
Rush hour congestion again... Can you find the quickest way through traffic?

Squeezy Car is a unique racing game where you control the speed and position of the car. The faster you go, the narrower the car becomes.

Features:
- hundreds of levels
- tap and hold the screen to move the car
- move left and right to control the car's position
- move finger up and down to control the car's speed
- move finger up to speed up the car
- the faster you go the narrower the car
- become narrow enough to squeeze between two cars
- move finger down to slow down

Squeeze through traffic! The faster you go the narrower the car!
